author: stevel
msg: eliminate JspExceptions, return meaningful error strings at potential trouble points (untested, obviously)

author: stevel
msg: this little tweak adds all jars in subdirs of lib to the classpath. Because "dist" only includes lib/*.jar into the WAR file, this lets you store jars you want for the build but not the WAR in a 'buildonly' subdir.
As an aside, we are including ${j2ee.jar} into this cpath. Where is this property being defined? Is it a command line option, -it aint properties.xml

author: stevel
msg: -two new classes that must be present for jsse to be found. I could not get jikes1.1.6+java1.4 to build without adding more tests for things we are importing. That is wierd...either java1.4 is incomplete or jikes is playing up. Probably the latter -but since the extra classes probed for are implicit imports in JSSESocketFctory, this should not affect javac+jsse builds.
